testcase.name: Successful purchase of a product
testcase.system-out: Given the user is logged in.................................................passed And user navigates to "Products" page.......................................passed When user clicks "Add to cart" on any product...............................passed Then user should see "Added!" message box...................................passed And user clicks "Continue Shopping" button..................................passed And user navigates to "Cart" page...........................................passed Then user should see products added in cart.................................passed When user clicks "Proceed To Checkout" link button..........................passed Then user should be redirected to "checkout" page...........................passed When user clicks "Place Order" link button..................................passed Then user should be redirected to "payment" page............................passed When user enters details for Name on Card, Card Number, CVC, Expiration Month, Expiration Year.passed And user clicks "Pay and Confirm Order" submit button.......................passed Then user should see "Order Placed!" message................................passed

testcase.name: Successful user registration
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the registration page..................................passed When user Enter name and email address......................................passed And click "Signup" button...................................................passed Then user should redirected to signup page..................................passed When user enter details for Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth.....passed And user select checkbox Sign up for our newsletter!........................passed And user select checkbox Receive special offers from our partners!..........passed And user fill details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed And user click on "Create Account" button...................................passed Then user should see "ACCOUNT CREATED!" message............................passed When user click "Continue" button...........................................passed Then user should see "Logged in as" user...................................passed

testcase.name: Register user with existing email
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the registration page..................................passed When User Enter name and already registered email address "testrtqa@gmail.com".passed And click "Signup" button...................................................passed Then User should still be on login page.....................................passed
